mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from bid
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bid
order by ${orderByClause}

update bid
BidCode = #{bidcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidno = #{bidno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidclassno = #{bidclassno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidtypeid = #{bidtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

transfee = #{transfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pledgetype = #{pledgetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrowerCode = #{borrowercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrowername = #{borrowername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrowerdesc = #{borrowerdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrowerinterest = #{borrowerinterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
instCode = #{instcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assureinstname = #{assureinstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ensuretype = #{ensuretype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement1 = #{agreement1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agreement2 = #{agreement2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agreement3 = #{agreement3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
raisemoney = #{raisemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
raisestate = #{raisestate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repaymentway = #{repaymentway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bindinnerno = #{bindinnerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidclassintro = #{bidclassintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

incomedesc = #{incomedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

redemrate = #{redemrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
transrate = #{transrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prepayrate = #{prepayrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
receiptdesc = #{receiptdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidnum = #{bidnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pubdate = #{pubdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_no = #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
membername = #{membername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
riskmgrfee = #{riskmgrfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
transname = #{transname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projectCode = #{projectcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projectfeature = #{projectfeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ApproStatus = #{approstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assureinstdesc = #{assureinstdesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT bid.bidno, bid.bidclassno, bid.bidtypeid, bid.bidtype, bid.bidclassname, bid.bidclasssubject, bid.bidimg, bid.amount, bid.investperiodtypeid, bid.investperiod, bid.raiseperiod, bid.raisebegindate, bid.raiseenddate, bid.exptinterestdate, bid.exptexpiredate, bid.annualizedrate, bid.intestcalctypeid, bid.intestcalctype, bid.exptlastacctdate, bid.mininvestamount, bid.maxinvestamount, bid.ifredeem, bid.redeemfeetype, bid.redeemfee, yieldsum.RemainPriAmount AS RemainPriAmount, bid.id, bid.iftransfer, bid.transfertype, bid.transfee, bid.instCode, bid.assureinstname, bid.ensuretype, bid.agreement1, bid.agreement2, bid.agreement3, bid.raisemoney, bid.raisestate, bid.bidstatus, bid.BidCode, bid.repaymentway, bid.bindinnerno, bid.bidclassintro, bid.investscope, bid.incomedesc, bid.incomeway, bid.raisecond, bid.redeemway, bid.raiserate, bid.redemrate, bid.transrate, bid.prepayrate, bid.receiptdesc, bid.bidnum, bid.pubdate, bid.memberid, bid.staff_no, bid.membername, bid.riskmgrfee, bid.transname, bid.ApproStatus, bid.projectCode, bid.yearservicefee, bid.remark, bid.pubfee, bid.infofee, bid.overduefee, bid.unpaidfee, investorder.InvestOrderCode AS InvestOrderCode FROM bid Inner Join investorder ON investorder.BidCode = bid.BidCode Inner Join yieldsum ON yieldsum.InvestOrderCode = investorder.InvestOrderCode WHERE investorder.transname = '2' AND investorder.OrderStatus = '1' AND investorder.InvestOrderCode = #{ordercode}

select
from bid where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} FOR UPDATE
select * from bid where raisemoney!=amount and bidtypeid=4 and bidstatus!=7 and bidstatus!=8 order by pubdate DESC limit 1
